acceptance-test-run.title: Invoking Podam on an interface should return an empty POJO
acceptance-test-run.name: invokingPodamOnAnInterfaceShouldReturnAnEmptyPojo

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>interface uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.InterfacePojo
Then the Pojo should be null
